item.title: Down Hatherley manorial
item.description: Down Hatherley is a rural parish to the west of Cheltenham
item.dc:creator: JamesH

item.title: Bitton Probate Inventories
item.description: Probate inventories for Bitton in South Gloucestershire, transcribed by volunteers at Gloucestershire Archives.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Sodbury Area Early Modern Wills
item.description: These wills from Gloucestershire Archives have been transcribed for VCH Gloucestershire by Judy Kimber. They cover Acton Turville, Chipping Sodbury, Little Sodbury, Tormarton, Wapley with Codrington and Yate.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Cirencester and District Early Modern Wills
item.description: These wills from Gloucestershire Archives have been transcribed for VCH Gloucestershire by Judy Kimber.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Cheltenham Early Modern Wills
item.description: These wills from the Gloucestershire Archives for Cheltenham and adjoining parishes have been transcribed by Judy Kimber on behalf of VCH Gloucestershire.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Tormarton Probate Inventories 1622-1784
item.description: Probate inventories for Tormarton in South Gloucestershire, transacribed by volunteers at Gloucestershire Archives.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Dyrham Probate Inventories
item.description: Probate inventories transcribed by volunteers at the Gloucestershire Archives on behalf of VCH Gloucestershire.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Oldbury on Severn probate inventories
item.description: These inventories were transcribed by volunteers at the Gloucestershire Archives as part of the preparatory work for future VCH Gloucestershire volumes.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Old Sodbury Inventories 1662 - 1780
item.description: These inventories were transcribed by volunteers at the Gloucestershire Archives as part of the preparatory work for VCH Gloucestershire volume 14, which will cover Yate and the Sodburys.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Leckhampton
item.description: This parish, to the south of Cheltenham, will form part of Volume 15 of VCH Gloucestershire.
item.dc:creator: JamesH
